summary: 2 LOW advisory issues - no blocking concerns

issues.title: Signature logging exposes potential PII
issues.why: Signatures are logged directly in error/info messages. If user-derived content flows into signatures via theme extraction, this could expose PII in logs.
issues.fix: Advisory only - verify SignatureRegistry sanitizes input. If user content can flow to signatures, sanitize before logging.
issues.verify: Check if SignatureRegistry.get_canonical() or issue_signature generation can include user-provided text

issues.title: Authorization model relies on service-layer trust
issues.why: add_conversation() accepts story_id without verifying caller permission. Internal services are trusted, but no access control exists at service layer.
issues.fix: No action needed for internal pipeline. Add authorization check if service is ever exposed publicly.
